name: Easy Seafood Fettucini
author: Anita
summary: A good, creamy sauce over fettuccini noodles.  You can use shrimp, tuna, mock crab, or whatever.  Tastes great, and isn't made with cream!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
4 ounces fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In a large saute pan, melt butter and saute onions and garlic until onions are almost translucent
Stir in flour, coating all of the onions well
Gradually pour in milk, stirring constantly
Stir in mushroom soup and seafood
Cook for 10 minutes or until shrimp are pink and scallops are opaque
